name: The European Lotteries
goal: The European Lotteries (EL) is the European umbrella organisation of lotteries operating games of chance for the public benefit. EL has members from 45 European countries including all 28 EU Member States. The association’s members contribute more than 20 billion EUR p.a. to the state budgets and the funding of sport, culture, social projects, research and other causes of general interest.
interests: Audiovisual and Media, Competition, Consumer Affairs, Culture, Home Affairs, Information Society, Internal Market, Justice and Fundamental Rights, Public Health, Sport, Taxation, Youth
euInitiatives:
Digital Single Market
European Week of Sport
Initiative on match-fixing
Anti-Money Laundering Directive
Follow-up to the 2012 Communication on online gambling
